snippet: Suzanne Farrell, one of George Balanchine’s greatest ballerinas, stages his works in Washington with her troupe.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews dance concert of Balanchine works performed by Suzanne Farrell Ballet at Kennedy Center in Washington.
lead_paragraph: Suzanne Farrell, one of George Balanchine’s greatest ballerinas, stages his works in Washington with her troupe.

headline.seo: Suzanne Farrell Ballet Stages Balanchine in Washington
headline.main: Staging Balanchine Classics as His Muse Provides a Link to the Source
